website_summaries.verdict: This steel-staked rain gauge has a plastic insert that rises with the water level.
pros: This product is plastic at the top for longevity
also available with a copper top
Replacement tubes available if the first one breaks
cons: Only extends about 18" above the ground when staked

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!t
customer_reviews.text: The rain gauge has flaws down both sides, I am super disappointed in the quality. I ordered it for a Christmas present, but cannot get a new one by Christmas. I have had one for two years that looks great, but it looks like the quality has gone way down hill. I am surprised that they would even ship it in that condition, so much for made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lovely rain meter
customer_reviews.text: The rain gauge is beautifully made and the pop up water gauge is a colorful addition to the copper sculpture. Lovely to look at and easy to insert into the ground. My husband is VERY happy with his gift as it's weather related, beautiful, and has a activity element of having to empty the blue cylinder. This is definitely a gift for those who are difficult to please.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put in the ground and stays in place. Can be read easily from a short distance - about 12’ from my experience.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Uptex

customer_reviews.title: So far it has held up well and continues to look beautiful in the garden
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rain gauge for a Father's Day gift a few years ago. So far it has held up well and continues to look beautiful in the garden. My dad loves that he can read the rain gauge from inside since the numbers are large and easy to read. I ended up buying one for myself too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this gauge
customer_reviews.text: I ordered another one of these gauges as the first one I had (for quite a few years) started to leak at the bottom. There was a seam there where the bottom piece was attached and it was slowly leaking, therefore no rain fall was measured. I really like this gauge, it is sturdy, reliable and looks good. I had to replace the plastic insert that would rise up with any rainfall, as it wore out and I'm holding on to this just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have an Accurite 5 in 1 weather station. ...
customer_reviews.text: We have an Accurite 5 in 1 weather station. Installed your rain gauge yesterday on a remote deck. It promptly rained. The readings totally matched.. Cuhllll! Simplicity accuracy and beauty in one package. Unbelievable. The business should be commended for designing an operational concept that attractive to investors.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence A. Buckland, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that it seems to measure consistently 2X as much ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it seems to measure consistently 2X as much rain as falls wether comparing with my old gages (2) that are right next to it or the weather bureau which is a mile away. I poured water back and forth between gages and it's just seems wrong to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Nord

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, very inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: I just threw away my WC rain gauge. As a rainwater harvester, accuracy is crucial. After repeated overestimates of rain, I got 2 more gauges, to compare and found the World's coolest to be very wrong. After 3 big rains, and up to an inch overeading, I chunked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, as well as functional!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality right out of the box. The gauge is bigger than expected and looks great next to my rural, cedar post garden walls. It has not rained since putting it out - our part of Texas is very dry right now, so I am VERY anxious to see it IN ACTION.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri V.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this rain gauge. It is nice to look at and works like a charm, just as described!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed. i really liked it back to the drawing ...
customer_reviews.text: i just thought we weren’t getting rain, knew we got a lot last night and found out that the seam on the bottom leaks it showed maybe 1/32 of an inch. i had this a couple of years now. so disappointed. i really liked it back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly4444

customer_reviews.title: It IS the coolest.
customer_reviews.text: I like mine so much, I bought 5 more for Christmas gifts. That says it ALL !
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Cool but pricey
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new rain guage. I am glad I got it for him but wish it had been a little more economical.
customer_reviews.author: Sewcraftylady

customer_reviews.title: Great rain n gauge
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rain gauge. It came with a defect and customer service immediately replaced it
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: Love the gauge
customer_reviews.text: My husband checks this as soon as it rains for more than 10 mins lol! It's fun to gauge the rain, looks great and as far as I can tell its accurate. We've only had it a few months and it still looks good
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Gertz

customer_reviews.title: We love this rain gauge
customer_reviews.text: We love this rain gauge! It took me forever to finally choose one and I'm glad this was it. Have had zero trouble with it and it's been outside in the snow! Luckily, it didn't break! If you're on the fence, I suggest you jump. You'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Meg V.

customer_reviews.title: truly is coolest rain gauge
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for my husband the other plastic ones have been knocked over by the grandkids and snapped this rain gauge is elevated and had metal outer elements tough and rugged and so cool to watch the inner blue piece raise with the rain
customer_reviews.author: cocopics

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its name!
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these rain gauges years ago and have loved it! I just ordered another one as a gift for my neighbor. It has looked great as "yard art" throughout this terrible Texas drought, but I especially appreciate it when it rains! I can read it out by the fence line from my back window, without having to go out and squint at the numbers like other rain gauges I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Loo

customer_reviews.title: Simple and dependable.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best rain gauge out there. I received one as a gift many years ago and finally replaced it with a new one. I would not even consider anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rain gauge
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it stands above vegetation in my flower garden, and because I can read it as a glance. It's actually my second; the first, which served me well for years, apparently got lost when I had some landscaping done. I hope I don't lose this one.
customer_reviews.author: restongirl

customer_reviews.title: Really is 'Worlds Coolest Rain Gauge"!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a while back (not through Amazon) and had a lot of complements. I bought this one as a Christmas gift and the person who got it loves it, as I do mine. I paid less on Amazon. The blue part rises as it fills with water, making it easy to read the gauge on the side of the blue tube. It really is cool!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C Meguiar

customer_reviews.title: very nice rain gauge
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for one of these, very nice rain gauge!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Markoski

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Little small for the price. Looks nice and looks like it will weather well.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: This really is the world's coolest rain gauge. It is fun to watch and looks great and was easy to install and read too.
customer_reviews.author: Missy McKee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and is attractive in the garden. We have now had it for a year and a half. No complaints. The insert has not deteriorated. It still looks great and measures the rain accurately, even those light (less than 1 inch) rains.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave to son-in-law as a gift. He absolutely loves it. So easy to read. He even sent me a picture of it showing almost 3" of rain!
customer_reviews.author: LindaC

customer_reviews.title: raintime
customer_reviews.text: hubby loves this guage...works great..he does take in for the winter, but easy to read and watch the guage rise....cool
customer_reviews.author: Somereset

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. If it is accurate
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Looks nice. If it is accurate, I'll get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It is just as pictured.  Impressive rain gauge!
customer_reviews.text: This is the World's Coolest Rain Gauge. This rain gauge is so nice, I would buy it as a gift for my family members. It is very easy to read and of nice construction. It is also resistant to breaking during the winter. We love, Love, LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: C.A. Vagner

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second gauge.Have had one for about 10years. Plastic beginning to fade, so got a new one. My son will continue to use the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert H. Butt

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Product!
customer_reviews.text: This rain gauge is a wonderful addition to any garden. It gets more attractive over time because of the natural patina it takes on. What's more, it's accurate. If you're looking for an unusual, yet practical rain gauge, you'll probably like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser Of Goods

customer_reviews.title: Unique design
customer_reviews.text: Unique design - can be read from several feet away. Artful appearance. Analogue - no batteries to change!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Wright

customer_reviews.title: Rain Gauge Pop Up
customer_reviews.text: Works good and looks nice. It rains a pop ups. Very simple to use. I was tired of the glass rain gauge always breaking.
customer_reviews.author: sagen

customer_reviews.title: It really is quite cool..
customer_reviews.text: It really is quite cool... not all that precise, but enough to tell if a summer storm excuses me from watering plants for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: G. P. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, durable, USA made
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy with this purchase for a gift and ordered one for ourselves. It looks beautiful in our yard, is accurate, simple, and best yet, made in the USA! Forget other designs...we'll have this a long time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the spend
customer_reviews.text: Rain gauge is pretty cool and more accurate in providing rain measurements
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased several of these. Well made and well received. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: atsu

customer_reviews.title: World's Coolest Rain Gauge
customer_reviews.text: We live in Costa Rica, and we do get alot of rain. We wanted to see how much up on our hill and plot the various months. This gauge is so easy. Big print, the white marks stand out against the blue tube, so there is never a question how much rain we got on a particular day. The copper tube looks great and just looks like an addition to the garden, not a gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Balch

customer_reviews.title: Rain gauge  Cool
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks good , I do not have to worry if the weather is BAD,, this will hold up, I have several other and that is not the case.. Buy and enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: copper rain gauge.
customer_reviews.text: my husband has broken every rain gauge he has ever had. this one is fantastic. very sturdy and east to read. it truly is the coolest rain gauge
customer_reviews.author: patsy t

customer_reviews.title: It truly lives up to its name! I gave ...
customer_reviews.text: It truly lives up to its name! I gave it as a gift, and may get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: ... husband for our 7th Cooper Wedding Anniversary and he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for our 7th Cooper Wedding Anniversary and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Roe

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, but made in America
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Looks great, and starts conversations. Only bad is its price, but we appreciate its "Made in America" quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Myers

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: This was a present. The recipient was very impressed and couldn't wait for it to rain. Works great. A real conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dowell

customer_reviews.title: ... lot of different rain gauges and this is the best after a
customer_reviews.text: Looked at a lot of different rain gauges and this is the best after a year
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Treutle

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: great quality, looks good in the garden. easy to read
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice yard art - with a function.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for anyone hooked on weather conditions. Really nice looking in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Ahnna

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra bucks!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it.... Easy to read , even from a window in the house !! It adds to the beauty of the landscaping with its design.
customer_reviews.author: Carol T

customer_reviews.title: This is a great rain gauge
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rain gauge. I bought it because I kept freezing my old ones. this one will not freeze.
customer_reviews.author: robkruege

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. My father in law tallies the rain totals daily.Still looks great after a full year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Aes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It really is the coolest rain gauge in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrye L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gauge for my husband to use in his rose garden. This summer has been hot and dry, and it's been hard to know if the plants were getting enough moisture. We're halfway between the 2 airports giving "official" rainfall totals and their numbers usually have no relation to what's happened our area. The gauge is easy to read from inside the kitchen door, and looks like an attractive garden sculpture. It also helped us to know how long to set sprinklers in the rest of the yard to get the required moisture.
customer_reviews.author: plays in the dirt

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Coolest rain gauge is 80 % inaccurate as compared to calibrated rain gauge. Very uncool.
customer_reviews.author: Craig H.

customer_reviews.title: Rain Guage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rain gauge for my father and he loves it. He says it really is the world's coolest rain gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie R. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this rain gauge. So easy to see the amount of rain from inside!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: World's Coolest Rain Gauge
customer_reviews.text: It's pricey but the markings are easy to read and it shouldn't freeze and bust like all the others I have purchased over the years. It's pretty colorful as well. People notice it and inquire about it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Fergi

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Husband
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband for our 7 yr wedding anniversary. He loved it! It looks really nice and it's neat how it works.
customer_reviews.author: LilSis67

customer_reviews.title: Neat rain gauge - just a little over priced.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, ok, copper is expensive, and noncorrosive to the general weather and the elements, Good points. But this is a curly copper holder, with a copper tube that has a weighted plastic tube in it. I bought this as a gife, but from what I have seen, it is too pricey fro what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Someonemysterious

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. Highly visible from inside my house. Would recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: cheryl weinberg

customer_reviews.title: rain gauge
customer_reviews.text: I've had this rain gauge before and happily was able to replace it. Love checking it after rain storm, glad to find the same style
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Heimerl

customer_reviews.title: Great rain gauge and beautiful addition to your garden
customer_reviews.text: It really works. It looks exactly like the picture and looks nice in the garden. You will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for the same item. After a period of time (several years) the foam that causes the tube to rise and measure rain becomes ineffective. Maybe there is a product that could replace only the foam, but normal Styrofoam or rubber won't do the trick. If you look at my review of the replacement tube available, you will see that it is not a guaranteed fit... But love the rain gauge. Easy to see from inside window - required 10 feet from any structure. Still looks good after patina develops on the brass. Very sturdy and fits easily into a large potted plant on patio..,
customer_reviews.author: My humble opinion

customer_reviews.title: Gift to Our Son-in-Law
customer_reviews.text: When our Son-in-Law opened his gift he went straight away to the back yard to install the World's Coolest Rain Gauge . It's a good thing he did, too. He got a measurable rainfall that evening and he was able to record the rainfall. Thanks for a functional and stylish rain gauge. See above review.
customer_reviews.author: Junelle Echlin

customer_reviews.title: I doubt it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is okay. It doesn't feel like it's worth 50 bucks. Gimme a month, or so, and I'll have a better feel for it.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Redeye

product_meta.title: World's Coolest Copper Rain Gauge. Accurate Floating Rain Gauge for Gardeners. Measure Rain, Monitor Irrigation, Save Water.
product_meta.description: World's Coolest Rain Gauge Copper Stake Mount Weather Instrument. Floating Measurement Tube Rises To Show Rainfall or Irrigation. Accurate Garden Tool For Gardeners, Weather Watchers, Gadget Lovers. This is the Original Floating Rain Gauge, Made in USA Since 1999.
feature_bullets: Measure rainfall, monitor sprinkler output and save water with the Original Floating Rain Gauge
Accurate rain guage has big numbers so it’s easy to read from the deck, patio, garden or lawn
Use in vegetable gardens, perennial beds and landscapes. A must for lawns and flower beds
Decorative rain gage is a great gift for gardeners. Easy and fun to use for any age or ability
Amazing customer service. It’s the World’s Coolest Rain Gauge -- Satisfaction Guaranteed!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
